channel.title: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed
channel.description: The Skip and Shannon: Undisputed Podcast. Skip Bayless, Shannon Sharpe, and Jen Hale discuss the biggest stories in the world of sports. It's unscripted and unfiltered. Don't miss the television show Monday-Friday at 9:30am ET on FS1.

item.title: Full Show (Lakers win in OT, Cowboys RB coach comments on Zeke vs Tony Pollard, Kyrie apologizes)

How impressive has Brady been this season? 1:41:59 Trey Lance suffered a fractured ankle in win over the Seahawks. How will the 49ers handle the return of Jimmy G as their starting QB? 1:47:48 Mike Evans and Marshon Lattimore are ejected for their fight. 1:54:28 Cousins and the Vikings face off against Hurts and the Eagles on MNF. Who will move on to 2-0? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Do you agree? 1:09:25 Can Baker and the Panthers bounce back against Daniel Jones and the Giants? 1:19:56 The Cowboys have yet to rule out Michael Gallup for Week 2. How would his return provide juice to the Cowboys offense? 1:32:14 Ryan Fitzpatrick says Brady never showed up respect or shook his hand when they played against each other 1:42:10 Stephen Curry was named the most revered Bay Area athlete ever. Should he be over legends Jerry Rice and Joe Montana? 1:49:31 Will Aaron Rodgers throw his receivers under the bus if the team continues to struggle? 1:54:58 Who are you picking in Chargers vs Chiefs tonight? item.title: The Skip Bayless Show - Skip's Most Memorable Undisputed Guests & Moments
item.description: Hey Undisputed fans! With Skip & Shannon off the air this week we wanted to share this special Q&A episode of the Skip Bayless Show, where Skip goes over his favorite moments and guests from Undisputed. Click here to follow The Skip Bayless Show: https://listen.foxaud.io/SkipBaylessShow?sid=unx To ask Skip a question for a future Q&A episode, tweet @SkipBaylessShow on Twitter, or leave your question with a 5-star review on Apple Podcasts. 00:00 What is the one thing you cannot leave the home without each day? 4:04 Is there a particular episode of Undisputed that you remember for one reason or another? 10:16 On the last game of the season, would you rather see the Cowboys knock Washington, Philly or the Giants out of the playoffs? Follow the Skip Bayless Show on all platforms: https://twitter.com/skipbaylessshow https://www.facebook.com/SkipBaylessShow/ https://www.instagram.com/skipbaylessshow/ https://www.tiktok.com/@skipbaylessshow https://www.youtube.com/c/skipbaylessshow Listen to & follow more FOX Sports podcasts: http://sprtspod.fox/b7si4wkv Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Best Of (Tom Brady on the latest QB rankings + LeBron on game-winning shots)
item.description: In the more than 150 year history of Major League Baseball, only one player has ever been murdered during a season. That player is Lyman “Wesley” Bostock Jr, a budding star for the Angels in the 70's, who was murdered by a man who whose court case would result in a stunning verdict. In this 8-part series from FOX Sports Podcasts, Tom Rinaldi explores Lyman's improbable life, his tragic death, and the miscarriage of justice that let his killer go free. Follow here: https://listen.foxaud.io/Wesley?sid=und 00:00 Tom Brady on latest QB rankings 10:21 LeBron says he never thinks about missing a game-winning shot Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
